title: FS: Clearance sale on T3, T212 and T206

posts.post_title: FS: Clearance sale on T3, T212 and T206
posts.post_content:
The following duplicate cards are available for sale.

   Brown                     $35.00

T3:

T206:

Prices are delivered.

Thanks for looking and please contact me at [url]mpeich@comcast.net[/url] if you are interested.

Cheers, Mike

posts.post_title: Clearance Sale on E95, E98 and 1915 CJ
posts.post_content:
Will also consider best offer or possible trades for Obaks, vintage postcards, and T209s. Thanks for looking.
